reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan warm and cozy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and warm
items.body: Very cozy and long. Great oversized fit. Read more
items.author: Julie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes
items.body: I cannot love this more. The dark green is lovelier in person and the length is so chic. Perfect for warmth around the house in the winter and a leveled up throw on and go addition to the errand running Read more
items.author: Laura Atkinson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this Sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater. Itâ€™s cozy, heavy and warm! Just be sure to be careful as it does snag easily. Still worth 5 stars â­ï¸ in my opinion. Iâ€™ll be ordering more colors. Read more
items.author: Kimberly Denise

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Flattering, and Cozy for Cooler Days
items.body: I got this cardigan in Forest, size medium, and I actually love the fit. I normally wear a 2X, but based on reviews I sized down, and it still gives that relaxed, oversized look without feeling sloppy. The material is soft and cozy without being too thick, which I prefer because it shows off my shape instead of hiding it. The pockets are deep and practical, perfect for keys or my phone. When I first took it out of the bag, it did have a slight smell to it, which is why the washing instructions caught my attention. The tag says hand wash only even though the listing says machine wash. I hung it up and sprayed it with a little fabric deodorizer, and the smell went away. Overall, this cardigan looks great, feels comfortable, and layers well for added warmth in fall and winter. Read more
items.author: Gwendolyn7777

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite amazon purchase!
items.body: Love love love this! 10 out of 10 recommend. Soft, comfy, stylish! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality.
items.body: Beautiful sweater. Thick and warm. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and stylish...perfect fall cardigan
items.body: I am a sucker for a great cardigan and this one did not disappoint. This is a beautiful and well-made piece that is both cozy and stylish and will make a perfect addition to my fall wardrobe. I am 5'3", 145lbs with a 36DDD chest and I ordered my normal size M and it fit me exactly as I hoped. The chunky knit fabric is a medium weight and feels warm and cozy, making it a perfect piece for chilly months. The overall fit is loose and comfortable and the cardigan has a good amount of stretch to it. The rich brown color is a beautiful and classic neutral tone that is perfect for fall. The sleeves are full with extra wide banded cuffs that are fitted but not tight. I appreciate the deep pockets and the long length ...even though at 5'3" it's slightly longer than I would like. It's a great layering piece that is both stylish and versatile enough that you can dress it up or down giving you a flattering yet effortlessly chic and cozy look. The sweater looked exactly as pictured. It came vacuum sealed so when I first took it out it was wrinkled and had packaging creases in it. Machine washed on cold and laid flat to dry and it came out great. Washing also helped soften it up. It appears to be well made and I think it has an appropriate price point. Overall this cardigan is a win for me and I definitely recommend. My ðŸŒŸ scale, from â­ to â­â­â­â­â­: â­ Regret in a Box...Disappointing and not worth the money. I wouldnâ€™t recommend this to anyone. â­â­ Needs Work...Has some potential but unfortunately falls short in too many ways. â­â­â­ Itâ€™s Fine...Decent, but nothing to get excited about and not something you'll reach for very often. â­â­â­â­ Really Good...Just shy of perfection and definitely still worth grabbing. â­â­â­â­â­ Exceeded my expectations!...A new wardrobe favorite. Iâ€™d absolutely buy again and highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Brandi Rede

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A really great sweater!
items.body: This is my absolutely favorite new sweater.I wear at least twice a week! It is so warm that for the most part.I can get away without having a coat.And it is so comfortable.And soft that I just want to snuggle up in it everywhere I go! The sizing chart is true to life.However, it is oversized, so it's gonna be baggy, which only adds to its comfy appeal. Read more
items.author: Asia McClain Chapman

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pink, Rust, Blue, Purple, Apricot, Forest, Black, Coffee, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
